articles.title: Verizon outage leaves some customers without service | CNN Business

neutral.headline: Verizon Experiences Service Interruption, Inconveniencing Customers
neutral.body:
Verizon announced on Wednesday that a portion of their wireless services were temporarily disrupted, resulting in some customers being unable to access voice and data services. The issue has affected a significant number of subscribers across various regions. The cause of the outage is currently under investigation by the company's technical team.
The impact of the service interruption has inconvenienced many Verizon customers who rely on their wireless connectivity for communication and data needs. While the exact number of affected users has not been disclosed, reports indicate that the outage has led to disruptions in voice calls and data usage for a substantial portion of the company's subscriber base.
Verizon has assured its customers that they are working diligently to resolve the issue and restore services to full functionality as soon as possible. In the meantime, the company advises affected individuals to stay updated on the situation through their official channels and to reach out to customer support for any assistance needed.
As Verizon continues to address the service disruption, customers are encouraged to exercise patience and understanding during this challenging time. The company remains committed to delivering reliable and seamless wireless services to its clientele, and efforts are being made to prevent similar incidents in the future.

neutral.headline: President Trump Considers Invoking Insurrection Act Amid Minneapolis Protests
neutral.body:
Amid ongoing protests in Minneapolis, which have at times turned violent, President Trump has raised the possibility of invoking the Insurrection Act. The protests, sparked by the death of George Floyd, have seen clashes between law enforcement and demonstrators, with an incident involving Immigration Customs Enforcement (ICE) on Wednesday further escalating tensions.
The Insurrection Act, if invoked, would grant the President the authority to deploy the military to address civil unrest. This move is being considered as a means to restore order and ensure the safety of all citizens in the affected areas.
President Trump's contemplation of utilizing the Insurrection Act comes as a response to the escalating situation in Minneapolis and the challenges faced by local law enforcement in managing the protests. The decision to invoke such an act is a serious consideration that requires careful deliberation and assessment of the situation on the ground.
As the situation continues to evolve, it remains to be seen whether the President will ultimately choose to invoke the Insurrection Act. It is crucial for all parties involved to work towards peaceful resolutions and uphold the principles of law and order during these challenging times.
